title: Updating conditioned properties is adding 1.3% of evaluation allocations
body:
For CPS-based projects we don't use this (legacy uses it for configuration sniffing) - yet this is 1.3% of evaluation allocations:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1103906/31064529-c8d16438-a788-11e7-82b7-0ecc91fb905c.png)

nodes.body: We opted out of this via https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/pull/2629.
